name: Pacsafe Rfidsafe V150 Anti-theft Blocking Compact Passport Wallet, Black
short_description: PROTECT YOUR IDENTITY - Keeps cash and important cards and documents close; RFID Blocking Material helps protect against identity and credit card hacker scanning. Enjoy protection from unauthorized transactions, and travel with peace of mind.

ORGANIZATION - Compact, with 6* Card Slots, 1* Zippered Mesh Window Slot for ID Card, 1* Mesh Passport Holder, 1* Boarding Pass Slip pocket, 1* Zippered Pocket, 1* Pen Loop. Features External Zippered Coins Pocket. With Elastic Band to keep wallet closed.

DETACHABLE STRAP - With hard-to-cut Wire Reinforced Webbing Strap which can be worn around the wrist or secured to a belt loop to help prevent pickpockets. Strap loop tightens to wrist when wallet is dropped or snatched.

RFID SAFE - RFID blocking material meets official US FIPS 201 quality standard for extra security to protect your credits cards/ IDs against unauthorized scans when traveling overseas to crowded tourist hotspots.

DIMENSIONS, WEIGHT & WARRANTY - 6.7"H x 4.9"W x 0.8"D Weight: 0.14kg. Made of soft, durable, water resistant & easy to wipe clean Nylon and Polyester to ensure secure & long-lasting usage everyday. Comes with a 2-year Pacsafe warranty.
Fabric type: 100 Nylon
product_description: The RFIDsafe V150 anti-theft RFID blocking compact passport wallet from Pacsafe is the ideal travel wallet to keep your personal information and valuables from falling into the wrong hands. Most ID cards, passports, and credit cards contain a RFID micro-chip that contains sensitive information, which can be accessed from up to 10 Feet away with an RFID reader. Pacsafe’s award-winning RFIDsafe blocking material that's built into the RFIDsafe V150 helps prevent the transmission of this data between 10MHz – 3GHz. The detachable, hard-to-cut dyneema webbing strap adds another layer of protection to help prevent pickpockets by wrapping it around your wrist or securing to the interior of a bag. The RFIDsafe V150 has internal organization that includes a zippered note slot, six card slots, a boarding pass slip pocket, and two side slop pockets. Pacsafe is all about secure mobility. With a wide range of stylish adventure backpacks, everyday bags, women's bags, camera bags, luggage, and travel accessories, Pacsafe lets you unpack the stress of protecting your gear, and instead, pack peace of mind.
